name: Spider
description: A small, predatory arachnid known for spinning webs to trap prey, highly adaptable in climbing and ambushing.
memorable: Noted for its ability to climb walls and ceilings, delivering venomous bites while being a common nuisance.
goals: To ambush unsuspecting creatures and trap them using webs.
relations: Often found with larger spiders or in environments where other small creatures are prey.
environment: Commonly encountered in forests, caves, and other dark places.
strengths: Excellent at stealth and ambushing due to its camouflaged body and abilities.
weaknesses: Easily defeated due to low hit points and poor physical attributes.
attacks: Uses a venomous bite that can deal piercing and poison damage, with a low damage output overall.
most_powerful_ability: Spider Climb allows it to move effortlessly on difficult surfaces, enhancing its ambush tactics.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 30 feet, improving its ambush skills in low-light environments.
skills: Proficient in stealth, granting it a high skill value to remain unnoticed.
additional_information: Can sense creatures touching its webs, providing tactical awareness.
Completely unaffected by movement restrictions from webs.
Capable of launching webbing to hinder movement of prey.
